data.apiNameCn: 查看出票授权与打票机信息
data.introduce: 查看本单位出票授权,单位信息，打票机信息
data.business: 对应DDI指令功能，查看本单位出票授权，单位信息，打票机信息
data.functions: 查看本单位出票授权，单位信息，打票机信息
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketDeviceInformationRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"查看出票授权与打票机信息请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"？","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketDeviceInformationRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"查看出票授权与打票机信息返回","children":[{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息：？","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误详细信息英文","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误详细信息中文","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TicketDeviceInformation","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"返回","children":[{"name":"Office","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"该DDI显示结果对应的office编号","children":[]},{"name":"IataNum","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"office的IATAnumber","children":[]},{"name":"PaymentTypeCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"付款方式","children":[]},{"name":"AgencyInfo","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"DDI中配置的office信息：代理人单位基本信息包括地址联系方式等","children":[]},{"name":"AmsEnable","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"是否使用AMS","children":[]},{"name":"Tkt","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航司结算三字码：票号类型","children":[]},{"name":"OriginalTextFromHost","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"originalTextFromHost","children":[]},{"name":"DeviceInfos","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"打票机信息列表：打票机信息","children":[{"name":"DeviceInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"打票机信息","children":[{"name":"DevNo","type":"int","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"打票机号：打票机序号","children":[]},{"name":"Pid","type":"int","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"打票机pid号：打票机PID号","children":[]},{"name":"Type","type":"int","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"类型：打票机类型,共四种 1-AL*I&：航空公司国际客票 2-BSPI：BSP国际客票 3-AL*D&：航空公司国内客票 4-BSPD：BSP国内客票","children":[]},{"name":"Et","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"ET授权","children":[]},{"name":"AutoSettlement","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"是否自动结算","children":[]},{"name":"CtlPid","type":"int","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"对当前打票机建控的pid号：建控PID","children":[]},{"name":"CtlAgent","type":"int","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"对当前打票机建控的工作号：建控工作号","children":[]},{"name":"Currency","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"该打票机可出票上的货币类型：货币种类","children":[]},{"name":"Tkt","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航司结算三字码","children":[]},{"name":"TnRange","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"当前票号范围：票号范围","children":[]},{"name":"IataNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"打票机iatanum：结算代码","children":[]},{"name":"OpenPrinter","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"开放打票机","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"AuthorizedAirlineInfos","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"授权信息","children":[{"name":"AuthorizedAirlineInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"授权给该office的航空公司列表","children":[{"name":"ZType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Z值类型","children":[]},{"name":"Airline","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"授权航司二字码","children":[]},{"name":"Et","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"ET授权","children":[]}]}]}]}]}]
